data.title: Terms and Conditions
data.body:
The amount displayed is only an indication and is still subject to a complete personal affordability and credit assessment.

The indication is in no way a pre-approval, pre-quotation or the like.

In order for a complete credit assessment to be done, the full application must be completed and submitted together with all required supporting documents once a specific home is identified.

The outcome of such full application is not guaranteed and is based on your income, expenses, credit rating and any other criteria applied by Nedbank Home Loans at the time of the full application.

All credit bureaux’s factor in the frequency of enquiries as part of their scoring; therefore if multiple enquiries are completed, this may have an adverse impact on your consumer credit scoring.

Please note that amounts provided are only an indication. Nedbank is unable at this stage to provide you with a formal quotation relating to the approval of your loan as the applicable documentation have not been provided and a full assessment has not been done. This is in accordance with the requirements of the National Credit Act, 2005 (“The Act”).

The indication is subject to the following conditions, namely:
Receipt of a satisfactory valuation on the property that is to be mortgaged as security.
Acceptance by you of the formal quotation in respect of the home loan.
Compliance by you with your obligations in terms of the agreement of loan thereafter to be concluded between Nedbank and yourself and,
That there is no change in any relevant factor and no new information becomes known to Nedbank which adversely affects the credit approval of your application, or the property in any manner.
